name: Śluz, który pożarł wszystko
text: Łatwy / Standardowy [skull]: -1 za każde 5 kart, które pochłonął Obiekt 8L-08. [cultist]: -2. Jeśli ten żeton zostanie odkryty podczas ataku przeciwko wrogowi, do tego ataku dany wróg zyskuje słowo kluczowe Mściwy. [tablet]: -3. Po zakończeniu tego testu Obiekt 8L-08 pochłania każdą kartę, która została przeznaczona do tego testu. [elder_thing]: -5. Wybierz do 5 kart z twojej ręki. Obiekt 8L-08 pochłania każdą z danych kart. Do tego testu dostajesz +1 do wartości umiejętności za każdą pochłoniętą w ten sposób kartę.
back_text: Trudny / Ekspercki [skull]: -1 za każde 3 karty, które pochłonął Obiekt 8L-08. [cultist]: -3. Jeśli ten żeton zostanie odkryty podczas ataku przeciwko wrogowi, do tego ataku dany wróg zyskuje słowo kluczowe Mściwy. [tablet]: -4. Po zakończeniu tego testu Obiekt 8L-08 pochłania każdą kartę, która została przeznaczona do tego testu. [elder_thing]: -7. Wybierz do 7 kart z twojej ręki. Obiekt 8L-08 pochłania każdą z danych kart. Do tego testu dostajesz +1 do wartości umiejętności za każdą pochłoniętą w ten sposób kartę.

flavor: You were in the town of Blackwater when the impact event occurred. For several days you investigated the matter, until the anomaly emerged and all hell broke loose. Fleeing is no longer an option, as the quarantine still holds and is strictly enforced. The only way you're getting out of here alive is if you can find a way to kill the anomaly... if such a thing is even possible.
name: The Anomaly Spreads
text: Each location is connected to each location adjacent to it (orthogonally).
back_flavor: From the center of the crater, a leyline of glowing ooze worms its way underground. Cracks appear in the ground throughout the town, like tendrils reaching out to stake their claim on Blackwater. It is as though the creature is rooting itself into the earth as it grows. Will the world ever truly be rid of it?
back_text:
Choose 2 [[Oozified]] locations, other than The Crater, without a copy of Vulnerable Heart. Subject 8L-08 devours both of those locations, along with all non-[[Ooze]] cards at those locations ([[Ooze]] enemies are instead discarded).
Shuffle 1 set-aside copy of Cubic Ooze and 1 set-aside copy of Grasping Ooze into the encounter deck, along with the encounter discard pile.

flavor: The creature from inside the meteorite continues to digest Blackwater whole. By day two, nearly all of the town is covered in vibrant green slime. Acid slowly eats away at the buildings, the streets, even the dirt. Will it ever cease?
name: The Anomaly Swells
text: Each location is connected to each location adjacent to it (orthogonally).
back_flavor: As the anomaly spreads throughout the town, the cracks in the earth become more prominent. In the middle of the night, a terrible sound like a growling stomach rumbles beneath the ground. Green ooze begins to erupt from within the cracks, overflowing throughout the town. It is clear now that no quarantine can hold this creature. If it is not stopped here, it will surely spread throughout the world.
back_text:
Choose 2 [[Oozified]] locations, other than The Crater, without a copy of Vulnerable Heart. Subject 8L-08 devours both of those locations, along with all non-[[Ooze]] cards at those locations ([[Ooze]] enemies are instead discarded).
Shuffle both set-aside copies of Oozewraith into the encounter deck, along with the encounter discard pile.

flavor: By the third day, the anomaly threatens to overtake the quarantine zone. The acid within its body can devour not just creatures, objects, and buildings; it is also capable of consuming thoughts, concepts, emotions, or other aspects of reality. You realize now that the creature threatens not just the lives of all humanity, but the fabric of existence itself.
name: The Anomaly Consumes
text: Each location is connected to each location adjacent to it (orthogonally).
back_text: Subject 8L-08 devours all cards in play and out of play, all cards in your collection, all cards that ever were, and all cards that ever will be. (→R1)

name: Expose the Anomaly
text: *This act has a global clue threshold (see page 6 of the rules for details). Only clues on copies of this act among all groups contribute to the global clue threshold. [free] Place up to 3 of your clues on this act. (Limit once per round.) Objective - At the start of the round, if the global clue threshold has been reached, you must advance. The event organizer will announce when this threshold has been reached. (Beware - advancing will expose the anomaly's weak spot. Be ready for a fight.)
back_text:
If this is the first time this act has advanced, read the following:
You've seen the anomaly's true heart. It lies beneath the surface of the ooze, pulsing with unseen power and guiding its myriad forms with alien hunger. You suspect this organ, whatever it may be, holds the secret to destroying the anomaly once and for all.
Regardless of how many times this act has advanced, read the following:
After hours of investigation, you believe that you have pinpointed the creature's heart. Due to the way it shifts throughout the surface of its all-encompassing body, you know it won't stay at its current location for very long. Then you'll have to track it down again...
Choose any [[Oozified]] location. Spawn the set-aside Vulnerable Heart enemy at the chosen location.

name: Expose the Anomaly
text: Objective - At the start of the round, investigators may spend the requisite number of clues, as a group, to advance. (Beware - advancing will expose the anomaly's weak spot. Be ready for a fight.)
back_text:
If this is the first time this act has advanced, read the following:
You've seen the anomaly's true heart. It lies beneath the surface of the ooze, pulsing with unseen power and guiding its myriad forms with alien hunger. You suspect this organ, whatever it may be, holds the secret to destroying the anomaly once and for all.
Regardless of how many times this act has advanced, read the following:
After hours of investigation, you believe that you have pinpointed the creature's heart. Due to the way it shifts throughout the surface of its all-encompassing body, you know it won't stay at its current location for very long. Then you'll have to track it down again...
Choose any [[Oozified]] location. Spawn the set-aside Vulnerable Heart enemy at the chosen location.

flavor: The creature's heart is exposed. Now is your chance!
name: Extraterrestrial Physiology
text: Forced - After any amount of damage is placed on Vulnerable Heart: Place twice that much damage on Subject 8L-08 as well. [free] While an investigator at your location is attacking Vulnerable Heart, spend 1 clue: That investigator gets +2 [combat] for this attack. Objective - At the end of the round, you must advance.
back_flavor: Mere minutes after its exposure, the pulsating heart retreats back inside the creature's vast body. You'll have to wait for it to re-emerge in order to harm it once more.
back_text:
Remove all damage from Vulnerable Heart and set it aside, out of play. The amount of damage that is removed from Vulnerable Heart in this way is X.
If X is at least 1, read the following:
All around you, the anomaly reels back for a moment. Then it erupts into the sky in a massive geyser of anger and hate. You duck for cover as gobs of ooze slam into the ground all over the city, splitting into even more sentient masses.
Shuffle the encounter discard pile into the encounter deck and discard cards from the top until [[Manifold]] enemies with a total of at least X health have been discarded. One at a time, in a random order, spawn each of those enemies at different [[Oozified]] locations.

flavor: You may have managed to finally harm the creature directly, but in doing so, you've caused it to split even further.
name: Blackwater's Bane
text: Each [[Ooze]] enemy gains retaliate and loses the Blob X keyword. Objective - At the end of the round, you must advance. (The scenario will not end when this act advances.)
back_text:
If this is the first time this act has advanced, read the following:
Throughout your struggles, an alien presence has watched your progress with curiosity. Now, they descend from orbit in order to hatch their plot.
Shuffle each of the set-aside Mi-Go Drone enemies into the encounter deck, along with the encounter discard pile.
Regardless of how many times this act has advanced, read the following:
As the hours pass, the ooze seeps back into the ground and lies dormant once more.
Place 1 [per_investigator] clues on each revealed [[Oozified]] location, to a maximum of its clue value. Draw the set-aside story card chosen as determined by the event organizer, resolving the side with the [[Part 1]] trait. Reset the act deck to act 1a.

flavor: You may have managed to finally harm the creature directly, but in doing so, you've caused it to split even further.
name: Blackwater's Bane
text: Each [[Ooze]] enemy gains retaliate and loses the Blob X keyword. Objective - At the end of the round, you must advance. (The scenario will not end when this act advances.)
back_text:
If this is the first time this act has advanced, read the following:
Throughout your struggles, an alien presence has watched your progress with curiosity. Now, they descend from orbit in order to hatch their plot.
Shuffle each of the set-aside Mi-Go Drone enemies into the encounter deck, along with the encounter discard pile.
Regardless of how many times this act has advanced, read the following:
As the hours pass, the ooze seeps back into the ground and lies dormant once more.
Place 1 [per_investigator] clues on each revealed [[Oozified]] location, to a maximum of its clue value. The lead investigator chooses a random set-aside story card and draws it, resolving the side with the [[Part 1]] trait. Reset the act deck to act 1a.

flavor: Poczerniała ziemia wyściełana jest łuskami nabojów, jednak nigdzie nie widać żadnych ciał. Dookoła rozlega się delikatne brzęczenie.
name: Krater
text: [action] Wydaj 1 środek zaradczy: zadaj 3 obrażenia Obiektowi 8L-08 lub dowolnemu wrogowi z cechą [[Powielenie]] w dowolnej lokalizacji. Wymuszony - Koniec rundy: każdy badacz znajdujący się na Kraterze otrzymuje 1 obrażenie.
back_flavor: Miejsce uderzenia to jałowa ziemia w samym środku strefy kwarantanny. Tuż obok znajduje się zrujnowane gospodarstwo, w większości pochłonięte przez bryły zielonego szlamu. Nad kraterem, na którego dnie leży kosmiczny meteoryt, nadal unosi się dym. Dostrzec można również zieloną poświatę – znak, że coś zdecydowanie nie jest w porządku.

name: Miejsce badań
text: [action] Wydaj 2 żetony wskazówek: zyskujesz 1 środek zaradczy. [action] Wydaj 1 środek zaradczy: umieść na Miejscu badań 2 żetony wskazówek (z puli żetonów).
back_flavor: Na tej leśnej polanie zespół naukowy Uniwersytetu Miskatonic rozpoczął swoje badania nad meteorytem i miejscem jego upadku. Obecnie białe namioty skrywają jedynie garstkę naukowców, która usiłuje znaleźć sposób na powstrzymanie anomalii, zanim rozprzestrzeni się ona dalej.

name: Tymczasowa kwatera główna
text:
[action] Wydaj 1 środek zaradczy: wybierz jedno -
- Wylecz 3 obrażenia.
- Wylecz 3 punkty przerażenia.
- Zyskaj 5 żetonów zasobów.
- Dobierz 3 karty.
back_flavor: Początkowo tylko nieliczni byli dopuszczani do tego wojskowego obozowiska. Olbrzymi czarny namiot rozstawiono pośrodku otwartego pola, aby mieć na widoku resztę Blackwater. Na zewnątrz zaparkowano wojskowe ciężarówki, jednak w samym obozie znajduje się podejrzanie mało żołnierzy. Macie nadzieję, że sytuacja nie wymknęła się jeszcze całkiem spod kontroli - choć sami w to do końca nie wierzycie.

flavor: Wzniesienie jest pokryte grubymi, fioletowymi grzybami, których masywne pnącza zagłębiają się w ziemię i oplatają drzewa. Z czym, do diabła, macie właściwie do czynienia?
name: Zagrzybione wzniesienie
text: [action] Wydaj 1 środek zaradczy: wybierz dowolnego wroga z cechą [[Mi-Go]] w dowolnej lokalizacji i wykonaj test [intellect] (0). Za każdy punkt, o który test się powiódł (sukces), zadaj wybranemu wrogowi 1 obrażenie (do maksimum 5).
back_flavor: W tej części lasu w powietrzu dryfują tajemnicze, pozaziemskie zarodniki. Jeśli wierzyć naocznym świadkom, to pokryte dziwnymi fioletowymi grzybami wzniesienie pojawiło się wraz z uderzeniem meteorytu. Te dwa fakty nie wydają się wam być ze sobą powiązane, ale z drugiej strony nie wierzycie też w takie zbiegi okoliczności.

flavor: Te kanały przecinają Blackwater wzdłuż i wszerz. Chociaż podróżowanie nimi nie należy do najprzyjemniejszych, możecie bez przeszkód przemieszczać się tędy z jednej części miasta do drugiej.
name: Kanały
text: [action]: Wykonaj test [intellect] (1). Jeśli test zakończył się sukcesem, porusz się do dowolnej lokalizacji oddalonej od Kanałów o maksymalnie X połączeń, gdzie X to liczba, o którą test się powiódł (sukces).
back_flavor: Coraz trudniej znaleźć w Blackwater miejsce, którego nie dotknęła jeszcze anomalia.

name: Bridge
text: [free]: Choose an exhausted [[Manifold]] enemy at Bridge and test [intellect] (X), where X is that enemy's evade value. If you succeed, defeat the chosen enemy. (Max one success per game.)
back_flavor: Very little of Blackwater has been left untouched by the anomaly.

flavor: This rusty old water tower has seen better days.
name: Water Tower
text: [action] If there are no clues on Water Tower: Test [intellect] (3) to find the structure's weakness. If you succeed, deal 3 damage to each [[Ooze]] enemy at Water Tower and at each connecting location. (Max one success per game.)
back_flavor: Very little of Blackwater has been left untouched by the anomaly.

name: Church
text: [action] If there are no clues on Church: Choose an [[Ooze]] enemy at Church, or a connecting location. Move the chosen enemy one location away from Church and automatically evade it. (Group limit once per game.)
back_flavor: Very little of Blackwater has been left untouched by the anomaly.

name: Oozy Lakebed
text: Forced - After a [[Manifold]] enemy spawns at Oozy Lakebed: Place 1 clue on Oozy Lakebed. That enemy cannot take damage this round.
back_flavor: Very little of Blackwater has been left untouched by the anomaly.

name: Slimy Streets
text: Forced - After you discover any number of clues from Slimy Streets: Reveal that many random tokens from the chaos bag. For each [skull] or [auto_fail] token revealed by this effect, take 1 damage or 1 horror.
back_flavor: Very little of Blackwater has been left untouched by the anomaly.

name: Desiccated Farmland
text: While you are at Desiccated Farmland, you cannot gain resources. Forced - After you end your turn at Desiccated Farmland: Lose 1 resource.
back_flavor: Very little of Blackwater has been left untouched by the anomaly.

flavor: When the anomaly emerged, the first thing the researchers did was try to find a way to dissolve the ooze composing its body. One of the chemists was on the verge of a breakthrough, but she recently disappeared. She was last seen attempting to collect samples in a dangerous section of the quarantine zone. If you can reach her, perhaps you can assist her.
name: Rescue the Chemist
text: Revelation - Spawn the set-aside Mi-Go Abductor at the Fungus Mound. Put the set-aside University Chemist asset into play at the location farthest from all investigators. Put this card into play, next to the act deck. Forced - After an investigator who controls University Chemist enters the Temporary HQ: Remember that "the chemist was saved." Flip this card over. Forced - If University Chemist is defeated or devoured: Remember that "the formula was not completed." Flip this card over.
back_text:
Read only if "the formula was not completed:" Remove Mi-Go Abductor, University Chemist, and this card from the game. Each investigator takes 1 horror. Lose 1 countermeasure.
Read only if "the chemist was saved:"
The chemist thanks you for aiding her and hands you the concoction her team has been working on - a universal solvent which can dissolve almost anything.
Put the set-aside Universal Solvent story asset into play under any investigator's control. Remove University Chemist from the game. Add Mi-Go Abductor and this card to the victory display. Deal 3 damage to any [[Ooze]] enemy in play.

flavor: With the emergence of the creature from within the meteorite, it has become clear that our understanding of the universe on a cosmic scale is flawed, at the very least. The anomaly defies all laws of biology, which makes it impossible to understand, let alone destroy. Perhaps if you can recover a sample of the meteorite, the researchers can study it in order to learn more.
name: Recover the Sample
text: Revelation - Spawn the set-aside Mi-Go Harvester at the Fungus Mound. Put the set-aside Meteorite Sample asset into play at The Crater. Put this card into play, next to the act deck. Forced - After an investigator who controls a Meteorite Sample enters the Research Site: Remember that "the sample was recovered." Flip this card over. Forced - If Meteorite Sample is attached to the Mi-Go Harvester and it is at the Fungus Mound: Remember that "the sample was lost." Flip this card over.
back_text:
Read only if "the sample was lost:" Remove Mi-Go Harvester, Meteorite Sample, and this card from the game. Lose 2 countermeasures.
Read only if "the sample was recovered:"
The few researchers who remain subject the meteorite shard to all kinds of tests. But before they can reach any sort of conclusion, a second creature breaks free from within. Panic erupts throughout the research station, but as the creature does not immediately attack, you wait and observe it closely. It begins to follow you everywhere you go, crawling along the ground like a lost duckling.
Put the set-aside Pet Oozeling story asset into play under any investigator's control. Remove Meteorite Sample from the game. Add Mi-Go Harvester and this card to the victory display. Gain 2 countermeasures.

flavor: Reports from survivors throughout the town tell of another force of creatures descending from above and collecting globs of ooze from all over Blackwater. What are these other alien creatures, and what is their goal?
name: Drive Off the Mi-Go
text: Revelation - Spawn the set-aside Mi-Go General at the Fungus Mound. Place 1 [per_investigator] clues on the Fungus Mound. Put this card into play, next to the act deck. Forced - If Mi-Go General is defeated, or if there are no clues on the Fungus Mound: Remember that "the Mi-Go were driven off." Flip this card over. Forced - If there are 4 [per_investigator] or more clues on Fungus Mound: Remember that "the secret of the ooze was stolen." Flip this card over.
back_text:
Read only if "the secret of the ooze was stolen:" Remove Mi-Go General and this card from the game. Until the end of the game, each Mi-Go Drone gets +2 health and +2 evade. Place this card next to the scenario reference card, as a reminder.
Read only if "the Mi-Go were driven off:"
Chittering unnaturally, the alien general flees. Its strange weapon unhinges from its arm and clatters to the ground in front of you as it flies into space.
Put the set-aside Mi-Go Weapon story asset into play under any investigator's control. Add Mi-Go General and this card to the victory display. Search the encounter deck, discard pile, and all play areas for each copy of Mi-Go Drone and remove them from the game. Gain 1 countermeasure.

flavor: You are approached by a military officer who informs you of the military's plan to destroy the anomaly using explosives. "I tried to tell them why it won't work, but the General was too stubborn to listen," he explains. "The explosives are on a timed fuse. If they detonate, it will only split the creature further and make it even harder to destroy. Orders be damned; we have to stop them!"
name: Defuse the Explosives
text: Revelation - Spawn the set-aside Mi-Go Meddler at the Fungus Mound. Put this card and the set-aside The Military's Plan asset into play next to the act deck, with 5 damage tokens on it. Place 1 horror token on 1 [per_investigator] different [[Oozified]] locations farthest from the Crater. Horror tokens on locations represent explosives. Forced - If there are no explosives among locations in play: Remember that "the explosives were defused." Flip this card over. Forced - If The Military's Plan has no damage on it: Remember that "the explosives were detonated." Flip this card over.
back_text:
Read only if "the explosives were detonated:" Remove Mi-Go Meddler, The Military's Plan, and this card from the game. Remove each explosives from each location. Each investigator and [[Ally]] asset at one of those locations takes 3 direct damage. Heal 5 damage from Subject 8L-08.
Read only if "the explosives were defused:"n
"Thanks for helping me," the officer says once the job is done. "I'll make sure our remaining forces know that their conventional tactics are useless against the creature. Perhaps there are other ways we can assist?"
Put the set-aside Lt. Wilson Stewart story asset into play under any investigator's control. Remove The Military's Plan from the game. Add Mi-Go Meddler and this card to the victory display. Each investigator heals 1 horror. Gain 1 countermeasure.

name: University Chemist
text: [action]: Parley. Test [willpower] or [intellect] (3). If you succeed, place 1 resource (from the token pool) on University Chemist. Then, if there are 1 [per_investigator] resources on it, take control of it.

name: Fragment meteorytu
text: Jeśli Fragment meteorytu nie jest kontrolowany ani dołączony do lokalizacji, dołącz go do jego lokalizacji. Jeśli jest dołączony do lokalizacji, na której nie ma żadnych żetonów wskazówek, Fragment meteorytu zyskuje: „[action] Wykonaj test [willpower] lub [agility] (6). Jeśli test zakończył się sukcesem, odłącz Fragment meteorytu i przejmij nad nim kontrolę”.

name: Mi-Go General
text: Hunter. Forced - After Mi-Go General attacks you: Move 1 of your clues to Fungus Mound.

name: The Military's Plan
text: Horror tokens on locations represent explosives. Each location with explosives gains: "[action]: Test [intellect] or [agility] (3). If you succeed, remove the horror token on this location." Forced - At the end of the round: Remove 1 damage from this card.

name: Uniwersalny rozpuszczalnik
text:
Zużywalny (4 zapasy).
[action] Wydaj 1 zapasy: wykonaj test [intellect] (1). Jeśli test zakończy się sukcesem, odrzuć kartę podstępu z cechą [[Przeszkoda]] w twojej lokalizacji.
[action] Wydaj 1 zapasy: wybierz nie-[[Elitarnego]] wroga w twojej lokalizacji i wykonaj test [intellect] (X), gdzie X to o 1 więcej niż wynosi pozostała wytrzymałość danego wroga. Jeśli test zakończy się sukcesem, dany wróg zostaje pokonany. Nie wywołuje to ataków towarzyszących.

flavor: UWAGA: POD ŻADNYM POZOREM NIE DOKARMIAĆ SZLAMIĄTKA
name: Oswojone szlamiątko
text: [fast] Pokonaj nie-[[Elitarnego]] wroga w twojej lokalizacji, którego pozostała wytrzymałość wynosi 2 lub mniej. Następnie wylecz wszystkie obrażenia z Oswojonego szlamiątka, umieść na nim 1 żeton zasobu i odkryj X żetonów chaosu, gdzie X to liczba żetonów zasobów znajdujących się na Oswojonym szlamiątku. Jeśli został odkryty symbol [auto_fail], zostajesz pokonany i otrzymujesz 1 punkt traumy fizyczne.

name: Broń Mi-Go
text: Zużywalny (3 naboje). [action] Wydaj 1 nabój: Walka. Urządzenie wystrzeliwuje wiązkę entropicznej energii. Do tego ataku dostajesz +2 [combat] i zadajesz +1 obrażenie. Jeśli test zakończył się sukcesem i wróg nie został pokonany, porusz go o jedną lokalizację, oddalając go od siebie. (Jeśli test zakończył się sukcesem o 3 lub więcej, zadaj +1 obrażenie i porusz danego wroga, oddalając go od siebie o dodatkową lokalizację).

name: Porucznik Wilson Stewart
text:
[fast] Wyczerp Porucznika Wilsona Stewarta: odrzuć kartę z twojej ręki lub z wierzchu twojej talii. Następnie za każdy znajdujący się na danej karcie symbol...
...[willpower] dostajesz +1 do twojego następnego testu w tej rundzie.
...[intellect] dobierasz 1 kartę.
...[combat] wylecz z niego 1 obrażenie lub punkt przerażenia.
...[agility] zyskujesz 1 żeton zasobu.

name: Mi-Go Drone
text: Spawn - Location with the most clues (other than Fungus Mound). Surge. Forced - At the start of the enemy phase, if Mi-Go Drone is ready: Move 1 clue from Mi-Go Drone's location to Fungus Mound.

name: Mi-Go Harvester
text: While Mi-Go Harvester is ready, it gains: "Forced - At the start of the enemy phase: If Meteorite Sample is attached to Mi-Go Harvester, move it once toward the Fungus Mound. Otherwise, move Mi-Go Harvester once toward Meteorite Sample's location. Then, if it is at the same location as Meteorite Sample, attach Meteorite Sample to it."

name: Mi-Go Meddler
text: While Mi-Go Meddler is ready, it gains: "Forced - At the start of the enemy phase: If Mi-Go Meddler is at a location with explosives, remove 1 damage from The Military's Plan. Otherwise, move Mi-Go Meddler once toward a location with explosives."

name: Mi-Go Abductor
text: While Mi-Go Abductor is ready, it gains: "Forced - At the start of the enemy phase: If Mi-Go Abductor is at University Chemist's location, deal 1 direct damage to University Chemist. Otherwise, move Mi-Go Abductor once toward University Chemist's location."

name: Subject 8L-08
text: *Subject 8L-08 has a global health pool (see page 6 of the rules for details). If Subject 8L-08 is defeated, proceed to (→R2).

name: Subject 8L-08
text: Subject 8L-08 gets +15 health. If Subject 8L-08 is defeated, proceed to (→R2).

flavor:
Subject Report: 8L-08-b
1846 hours - Recovered subject sample (8L-08-b) for further study. Subject appears to share same physiological qualities as 8L‑08, but acts with its own sentience. The pH levels observed in subject are similar to those found in 8L-08... (report continues on next page)
name: Oozeling
text: Spawn - Any empty [[Oozified]] location. Blob 1.

name: Grasping Ooze
text: Spawn - Nearest [[Oozified]] location. Hunter. Forced - After you perform an attack against Grasping Ooze using a [[Melee]] card: Subject 8L-08 devours that card. Blob 3.

name: Cubic Ooze
text: Revelation - Immediately attempt to evade Cubic Ooze (without spending an action). If you fail, spawn Cubic Ooze engaged with you, and it attacks you. If you succeed, spawn Cubic Ooze at your location, exhausted and unengaged. Blob 2.

name: Oozewraith
text: Spawn - Farthest [[Oozified]] location. Alert. Hunter. Retaliate. Blob 5.

name: Vulnerable Heart
text:
Massive. Retaliate.
X is the amount of damage on Vulnerable Heart.
Vulnerable Heart cannot be evaded and cannot make attacks of opportunity.
Vulnerable Heart cannot have more than 15 damage on it. All excess damage is canceled.

name: Reality Acid
text: Revelation - Subject 8L-08 devours a random aspect of reality. Reveal two random chaos tokens from the chaos bag and consult pages 16-19 of the rules to determine what it devoured. (If the combination of chaos tokens revealed is not listed, or if the listed aspect cannot be devoured, reveal two new chaos tokens and consult the chart again.)

flavor: You are forced to look away as the ooze engulfs his body almost instantly.
name: Devouring Ooze
text: Revelation - Test [agility] (4). If you fail, choose an [[Ally]] or [[Item]] asset you control. Subject 8L-08 devours that asset. (If you cannot, take 2 damage instead.)

flavor:
"It ate all the lab equipment? But wait, how did it get through the isolation chamber? What about Dr. Roberts - "
"It ate EVERYTHING!"
name: Corrosive Slime
text: Revelation - Test [willpower] (4). For each point you fail by, Subject 8L-08 devours either one of your resources or a random card from your hand.

flavor: Jaws of slime close around you, enveloping you in alien acid.
name: Consuming Maw
text: Revelation - Test [agility] (3). Take 1 damage for each point you fail by. Subject 8L-08 devours each card defeated by this effect.

flavor: Green slime suddenly floods through the street, devouring everything it touches.
name: Wave of Ooze
text: Revelation - Test [willpower] (3). Take 1 horror for each point you fail by. Subject 8L-08 devours each card defeated by this effect.

name: Caustic Dissemination
text: Revelation - Put Caustic Dissemination into play next to the agenda deck. Forced - At the end of the round: Each investigator at an [[Oozified]] location takes 1 damage and 1 horror. Subject 8L-08 devours each card defeated by this effect. Discard Caustic Dissemination. (Max once per round.)

flavor: "I just bought those shoes!"
name: Sticky Feet
text: Revelation - Attach to the nearest [[Oozified]] location. As an additional cost to enter or leave attached location, an investigator must spend an action. [action] Spend 1 countermeasure: Discard Sticky Feet.

name: Replication
text: Revelation - Find the [[Manifold]] enemy with the most damage on it. Discard cards from the top of the encounter deck until another [[Manifold]] enemy with equal or lower printed health is discarded. Spawn that enemy at the same location, then distribute the damage that is on both enemies so that the remaining health on both enemies is as equal as possible. If no enemy is spawned by this effect, Replication gains surge.

name: "It's got me!"
text: Revelation - Put "It's got me!" into play in your threat area. Forced - At the end of the round: Place 1 resource on "It's got me!" Then, if there are 6 or more resources on it, Subject 8L-08 devours you. [action] If you are at the Research Site, spend 1 countermeasure: Discard "It's got me!"

name: Alien Food Chain
text: Revelation - If there are no [[Manifold]] enemies in play, Alien Food Chain gains surge. Otherwise, attach to the [[Manifold]] enemy with the least remaining health and fully heal that enemy. Attached enemy gets +1 fight, +1 evade, and gains hunter.
